availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Barnes and Sarah Barnes. Married Mary J. Barnes. Father of Emily F. Barnes, William Barnes, and Lizzie Barnes. Farm laborer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Unnamed District, p. 221; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 4, p. 12.
